title: Accent on learning
creator_contributor_role: Department of Photography, Ohio State University, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education - Study and teaching
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Teaching - Aids and devices
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Teachers - Training of
description: This film explores the meaning of teaching and suggests creative methods for use by teachers. Samples of teaching methods are shown: lecturers who communicate with words, with the assistance of the blackboard, with slide projectors etc. Success in teaching rests upon organisation of material in a meaningful way. Suggested materials are charts, films, film strips, lantern slides, tape recorders.
